esqlQuery.esql:
// The recommended threshold value for response latency is > 5 seconds, and the alerting rule is grouped by Model Name. You can adjust the threshold value by modifying the time_to_response in the WHERE clause, which is specified in milliseconds. 
FROM metrics-azure.open_ai-default
| STATS time_to_response = AVG(azure.open_ai.time_to_response.avg) by azure.dimensions.model_deployment_name
| WHERE time_to_response > 5000
